title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
OB: The report design currently stores the absolute path of the library include. For example, <property name="fileName">E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property>.
EB: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path. When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. For example, if the report design is located in $project/test, the relative path should be saved as lib1.rptlibrary.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Create a new report design or open an existing one.
3. Include a library in the report design.
4. Save the report design.

Expected result: The relative path of the library include should be saved according to the location of the report design.
